titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Symposium on the 35th Anniversary of Avery et al. papers
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Symposium on the 35th Anniversary of Avery et al. papers FA887

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-11-01 03:26:01 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Symposium on the 35th Anniversary of Avery et al. papers

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

fileplan.head: File Plan note
fileplan.p: Recatalogued from I 600-12, which is A.E. Mirsky collection, to I 600-16 per May 1985.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Symposium February 2, 1979 at RU celebrating the 35th anniversary of publication of: Avery, Oswald T., MacLeod, Colin and McCarty, Maclyn "Studies on the chemical nature of the substance inducing transformation of pneumococcal types" Published in: JOURNAL OF EXPERIMENTAL MEDICINE 79 (1944) 137-158.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Primarily contains photographic materials and copies.

did.unittitle: Copy of symposium transcribed from tapes; photocopy of slides used in addresses
Addresses by Joshua Lederberg, Ren√© Dubos and Maclyn McCarty
